content.text:
Agenda

1. Device Code Flow - Pieter (45 min)

2. Step-up Authentication - Vittorio (30 min)

https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/draft-bertocci-oauth-step-up-authn-challenge

3. Libraries - Daniel (40 min)

https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/msg/oauth/h9_Ki1UYT8sS0xKqGrzWI6yHaNA/

4. PKCE in the Security BCP (10 min)

Materials

Materials

IETF 113
